channel.title: APIOps and decK :: API Management with Kong Konnect and Serverless API Gateway
channel.description: Concept APIOps applies DevOps principles (automation, version control, CI/CD) to API lifecycle management. With Kong Konnect and decK, APIs can be treated as code â€” versioned, tested, and deployed through pipelines. Download the OpenAPI specification Download the kong-air-apis.yaml OpenAPI spec.
